subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: One of them, at least, should be in the major leagues by now. And few scouts who saw Wade Townsend, Jeff Niemann and Philip Humber pitch Rice to the 2003 College World Series championship as sophomores would question it, either.
snippet: One of them, at least, should be in the major leagues by now. And few scouts who saw Wade Townsend, Jeff Niemann and Philip Humber pitch Rice to the 2003 College World Series championship as sophomores would question it, either.
